explanation: Marcus claims he was bowling at Sunset Lanes until 11 PM, but Clue 3 reveals the bowling alley closes at 10:30 PM and Monday leagues end at 10 PM. He lied about his timeline to hide the gap between 10 PM and midnight. Clue 1 shows a re-entry badge-in at 11:30 PM, and Clue 2 shows a car entering the garage at 11:25 PM. Marcus returned to the office after bowling and changed the password at 11:47 PM.
funFact: The most common WiFi password in offices is still 'password123' -- network engineers everywhere weep.
